headline: NiSource to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Host Conference Call on August 6
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., July 23, 2025--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) will release second quarter 2025 earnings and host a conference call for investors on Aug. 6.

raw.headline: NiSource to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Host Conference Call on August 6

headline: NextEra Energy (NEE) Tops Q2 Earnings Estimates
summary: NextEra (NEE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +2.94% and -7.28%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
